result.eng: The computer has run out of memory.
result.html: Tá cuimhne an ríomhaire íditheThe computer has run out of memory.
result.ponchtml: Tá cuiṁne an ríoṁaire ídiṫeThe computer has run out of memory.

result.html: De réir mo chuimhneAs far as I remember.
result.ponchtml: De réir mo ċuiṁneAs far as I remember.

result.ga: Go raibh maith agat as é sin a chur i gcuimhne dom
result.orig: Go raibh maith agat as é sin a chur i gcuimhne dom
result.html: Go raibh maith agat as é sin a chur i gcuimhne domThanks for reminding me that.
result.ponchtml: Go raiḃ maiṫ agat as é sin a ċur i gcuiṁne domThanks for reminding me that.

result.eng: If my memory serves me right. If I remember correctly.
result.html: Más buan mo chuimhneIf my memory serves me right. If I remember correctly.
result.ponchtml: Más buan mo ċuiṁneIf my memory serves me right. If I remember correctly.

result.eng: I can't you chase you out of my memory.
result.ga: Ní féidir liom tú a ruaigeadh as mo chuimhne
result.orig: Ní féidir liom tú a ruaigeadh as mo chuimhne
result.html: Ní féidir liom tú a ruaigeadh as mo chuimhneI can't you chase you out of my memory.
result.ponchtml: Ní féidir liom tú a ruaigeaḋ as mo ċuiṁneI can't you chase you out of my memory.

result.eng: He wrote memoirs about Nazi death camps.
result.ga: Scríobh sé cuimhní cinn faoi champaí báis na Naitsithe
result.orig: Scríobh sé cuimhní cinn faoi champaí báis na Naitsithe
result.html: Scríobh sé cuimhní cinn faoi champaí báis na NaitsitheHe wrote memoirs about Nazi death camps.
result.ponchtml: Scríoḃ sé cuiṁní cinn faoi ċampaí báis na NaitsiṫeHe wrote memoirs about Nazi death camps.

result.html: Tá cuimhne acu ort fósThey still remember you.
result.ponchtml: Tá cuiṁne acu ort fósThey still remember you.

result.ga: Tá sé le cuimhne na ndaoine
result.orig: Tá sé le cuimhne na ndaoine
result.html: Tá sé le cuimhne na ndaoineIt is within living memory.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé le cuiṁne na ndaoineIt is within living memory.

result.eng: I was reminded of my first visit to America, many years ago.
result.ga: Cuireadh mo chéad chuairt ar Mheiriceá i gcuimhne dom blianta fada ó shin
result.orig: Cuireadh mo chéad chuairt ar Mheiriceá i gcuimhne dom blianta fada ó shin
result.html: Cuireadh mo chéad chuairt ar Mheiriceá i gcuimhne dom blianta fada ó shinI was reminded of my first visit to America, many years ago.
result.ponchtml: Cuireaḋ mo ċéad ċuairt ar Ṁeiriceá i gcuiṁne dom blianta fada ó ẛinI was reminded of my first visit to America, many years ago.
